mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, board_category.category_title as category_title, faqboard.title as title, faqboard.readcount as readcount, faqboard.num as num from faqboard, board_category where faqboard.category=board_category.category_num)a where a.rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by num desc

select * from(select rownum rn, board_category.category_title as category_title, faqboard.title as title, faqboard.readcount as readcount, faqboard.num as num, faqboard.content as content from faqboard, board_category where faqboard.category=board_category.category_num)a where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update faqboard set readCount=readCount+1 where num=#{num}
update faqboard set title=#{title}, category=#{category}, content=#{content}, reg_date=sysdate where num=#{num}
update faqboard set re_step=re_step+1 where re_step>#{re_step}
